examples.korean: When a substance burns or rusts, it is oxidized. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 물질은 타거나 녹슬 때 산화된다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: When a substance burns or rusts, it is oxidized. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Nails can rust in a matter of hours if they’re not galvanised, and gardens have to be planted with sea spray and wind in mind. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 못들은 만약 아연으로 코팅하지 않는다면 몇시간 안에 녹슬 수 있다. 그리고 정원은 파도의 비말과 바람을 염두하고 조경되어야 한다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 JAKE L(dleh****)
examples.english: Nails can rust in a matter of hours if they’re not galvanised, and gardens have to be planted with sea spray and wind in mind. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: And three weeks isn't enough to get rusty, so it's not amazingly surprising I'm playing well now. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그리고 3주란 시간이 제 실력이 녹슬만큼 긴 시간이 아니라서 제가 지금 잘 하고 있다는 사실도 놀라운 일은 아닙니다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 Angela teacher(bbae****)
examples.english: And three weeks isn't enough to get rusty, so it's not amazingly surprising I'm playing well now. Add to Wordbook
